Articles.Content:
Hi All. I've been playing Kerbal since 0.23 and had a load of fun on it since. When I discovered KSP it was just what I had been looking for in a Space sim after years of playing Orbiter I wanted something more creative, I'm sure your stories are very similar. I've had a blog for a while where I posted quite a few photos of my previous exploits, but I haven't updated it in a while. I'm just coming back round to get my teeth stuck into the BETA-than ever update.

You can check out my previous screenshots and keep up with probably new ones (eventually)

(you Don't have to visit the link! just showing some of my screens of my exploits so far)

Here:

http://kerbalspaceblog.tumblr.com

It's great to be part of the forum I look forward to seeing all the great stuff people post here!

Edited January 4, 2015 by PilotNaut
Welcome to the forum. What's with that ship with the wheels placed so that all it could do is spin?

Welcome to the forum. What's with that ship with the wheels placed so that all it could do is spin?

lol very early figuring out of parts. I found out the hard way

Okay then.

haha, I know which one you're talking about now. believe it or not that was Laythe bound. it had landing legs too I think I remember the wheels actually having a purpose now I remember, was trying to fit different nodes together and thought that might help on-the-surface.

I think that was the point anyway

I remember playing at a very early age some sort of space shuttle simulator. (Wasn't orbiter)

Took me 5 and a half seconds to accidentally blow it up.

I can blow up stuff in KSP in half the time!

Welcome to the forum!
